author: Special Correspondent
text:
‘A’ grade for college

The Sethu Institute of Technology at Kariapatti in Virudhunagar district has been accredited with ‘A’ grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). This follows a visit by a peer team comprising K. E. Raman, former Director, BITS, Pilani (chairperson); Varinder Sahni, former Director, Sant Longowal Institute of Engineering and Technology, Punjab, and V. Venkatakrishna, former Principal, Godavari Institute of Engineering and Technology, Andhra Pradesh, to the institution from March 3 to 5 for assessment.

The Sethu Institute of Technology has been given a cumulative grade point average of 3.1 on a scale of 4. According to a press release, the chairman, S. Mohamed Jaleel, congratulated the faculty members, non-teaching staff, students, parents, alumni and employers for the achievement.
title: ‘A’ grade for Sethu Institute of Technology
